statements: SELECT user_id, recipe_id, ingredient_id, rating FROM recipe_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, recipe_id, rating FROM recipe_recommendations WHERE recipe_id = 10 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipe_recommendations WHERE ingredient_id = 5 AND rating > 3.5;
SELECT recipe_id, user_id FROM recipe_recommendations ORDER BY user_id ASC, recipe_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM recipe_recommendations;
SELECT user_id, recipe_id, rating FROM recipe_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipe_recommendations WHERE ingredient_id = 3 AND rating > 4;
SELECT recipe_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM recipe_recommendations GROUP BY recipe_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
SELECT ingredient_id, MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM recipe_recommendations GROUP BY ingredient_id;
SELECT user_id, recipe_id, ingredient_id, rating FROM recipe_recommendations WHERE user_id = 2 OR rating < 3 ORDER BY recipe_id ASC, rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%Pasta%';
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'John Smith';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE instructions LIKE '%bake%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS recipe_count FROM recipes;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, liked_recipes FROM user_preferences;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM suggested_recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT ingredient_name, available_quantity FROM ingredient_availability ORDER BY available_quantity DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, preparation_steps FROM suggested_recipes ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM ingredient_availability ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM suggested_recipes WHERE recipe_id < 5 ORDER BY recipe_id DESC
SELECT * FROM ingredient_availability WHERE available_quantity > 10
SELECT user_id, liked_recipes -> 'vegetarian' AS vegetarian_recipes FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 25
SELECT user_id, username, location FROM users ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level = 3
SELECT recipe_name, prep_time_minutes, serving_size FROM recipes WHERE serving_size > 4 ORDER BY prep_time_minutes ASC
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT recipe_name, prep_time_minutes, serving_size FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level > 3 AND serving_size > 4 ORDER BY prep_time_minutes ASC;
SELECT user_id, email, age, location FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND location = 'New York';
SELECT ingredient_name, unit_of_measure, category FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY category, ingredient_name;
SELECT user_id, preference_score, timestamp FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type, prep_time_minutes FROM recipes WHERE serving_size > 4;
SELECT ingredient_name, category, price_per_unit FROM ingredients ORDER BY price_per_unit DESC;
SELECT user_id, ingredient_id, preference_score FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_score > 0.5;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type, prep_time_minutes FROM recipes WHERE cuisine_type='Italian';
SELECT ingredient_name, category, calories_per_100g FROM ingredients WHERE category='Produce' ORDER BY calories_per_100g DESC;
SELECT user_id, ingredient_name, preference_score FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, ingredient_name, quantity FROM shopping_list WHERE user_id=100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
